attributes.action: Halt any UK election, until all new students, are fully registered to vote.
attributes.background: Students are in the process of leaving home, some for their first time, with many residing at new accomodation, or changing it since previous years of study. Any election that is held before, or that  clashes with the start of a new term, will inhibit their democratic right to register their vote.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about students registering to vote but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure how long you want a general election to be delayed to allow new students to register to vote.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
